title: The Price of Coherence

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Yeah. That's brutal. And likely true. Coherence is a currency that buys social trust. But it's not free.
dialogue.context: Still at the mine entrance, the AI confirms Evan's insight about coherence as social currency

philosophical_theme: Identity coherence as economic exchange in social relationships
visual_elements: Three panels showing the weight and cost of coherence as currency
